law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1559, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 28, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 537, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 282, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 282, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1978.
